hero.title: Full-Stack Developer Powered by AI. Design → Code → Deploy, All in One.
hero.subtitle: No 10-person team needed. I leverage AI tools to complete design-to-deployment workflows solo—delivering products that self-iterate, not just code.

valueProposition.title: Why Choose an AI-Native Developer in 2025
valueProposition.subtitle: In the AI era, experience = adaptability × tool mastery, not years. I compress 3-month dev cycles into 3 weeks using Claude Code, Cursor, and v0.dev—same quality, 1/10th the cost.

rapidPrototyping.title: AI-Accelerated Prototyping
rapidPrototyping.description: Traditional devs spend 2 days on UI mockups? I generate high-fidelity designs in 2 hours with AI tools, then convert to production code instantly. 3-week MVP delivery is my standard.

uiux.title: Full-Stack AI Workflow
uiux.description: From Figma design (AI-assisted) to Next.js deployment (AI-debugged), I handle the entire stack. You get a self-documenting, test-covered codebase—without hiring a team.

performance.title: AI-Powered Optimization
performance.description: While others Google error messages, I let AI analyze stack traces and generate fixes. 70% faster debugging, automatic documentation, zero-cost code reviews via LLMs.

services.title: Service Areas: AI-Enhanced Development & Strategic Consulting
services.subtitle: Leveraging AI to deliver what traditional teams can't—speed without compromise

web.title: AI-Enhanced Web Development
web.description: Next.js 14 + AI-assisted workflows deliver production apps in 2 weeks, not 3 months. 95+ PageSpeed scores, auto-generated SEO, and built-in analytics—standard, not extras.

mobile.title: Smart Mobile Solutions with AI Integration
mobile.description: React Native apps debugged 5x faster with AI tools. Plus: integrate ChatGPT/Claude APIs into your iOS/Android apps for AI-powered features that give you a competitive edge.

seo.title: AI Integration & Automation Consulting
seo.description: Turn your legacy app 'AI-powered' overnight. I integrate GPT-4, Claude, or Gemini APIs for smart chatbots, content generation, or data analysis—opening new revenue streams.
